description: The construction of a six storey block, incorporating balconies, on the site of 35 Clyde Street SE8, comprising 25 one-bedroom, 46 two-bedroom, 4 three-bedroom and 5 studio, self-contained flats, together with associated landscaping and provision of a sub-station, intake room, refuse store, bicycle store and 40 car parking spaces with access onto Clyde Street.
